title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki - XWiki
content:

nickless left at 02:57 (Ping timeout: 265 seconds

Denis left at 07:04 (Ping timeout: 276 seconds  
Denis joined #xwiki at 07:09  
mflorea joined #xwiki at 07:54  
kibahop joined #xwiki at 07:57  
plunden joined #xwiki at 08:11  
evalica joined #xwiki at 08:27  
mariusbutuc joined #xwiki at 08:28  
vmassol joined #xwiki at 08:31  
sdumitriu joined #xwiki at 09:05  
sburjan joined #xwiki at 09:23  
silviar joined #xwiki at 09:26  
tmortagne joined #xwiki at 09:40  
sdumitriu - (09:53): When does the release start?  
tmortagne - (09:55): checking hudson  
tmortagne - (09:56): looks like vmassol did not found how to fix it  
sdumitriu - (09:57): Can I still commit?  
tmortagne - (09:57): there was a lot of failing tests in the last build it seems  
tmortagne - (09:58): sure  
tmortagne - (09:59): and not all related to getSyntaxId  
tmortagne - (09:59): see http://hudson.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-product-enterprise-tests/com.xpn.xwiki.products$xwiki-enterprise-test-selenium/970/testReport/ and http://hudson.xwiki.org/job/xwiki-product-enterprise-tests/com.xpn.xwiki.products$xwiki-enterprise-test-ui/970/testReport/  
vmassol - (10:03): tmortagne: yes I haven't fixed it  
vmassol - (10:03): guys we all need to look at the build this morning and fix it so that we can release this afternoon  
sdumitriu - (10:08): OK, I need some help on making a decision  
sdumitriu - (10:09): I have a piece of JavaScript, the XWiki.Document class  
sdumitriu - (10:09): Currently it has only getURL and getRestURL  
sdumitriu - (10:09): Should I commit it?  
sdumitriu - (10:09): And if yes, what would the related issue look like?  
jvdrean joined #xwiki at 10:15  
vmassol - (10:22): hudson agents back to normal  
vmassol - (10:26): sburjan: quick question (good morning btw :)). Do you know why when you click on a skin image on http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Features/Skins it gives a smaller image? Shouldn't it be the other way around? Should we remove the click instead?  
sburjan - (10:27): the old version was a img link to the file  
sburjan - (10:27): I mean.. the image is linked to the file.. it's a link  
sburjan - (10:27): I can remove it if you want  
vmassol - (10:28): does it mean the image displayed is stretched and not the original size?  
vmassol - (10:28): checking  
vmassol - (10:28): ah you have 2 images  
vmassol - (10:28): which is good for high quality  
vmassol - (10:29): but I'd use an larger image when you click on the skin image  
jvdrean1 joined #xwiki at 10:29  
vmassol - (10:29): as otherwise I don't see the point  
vmassol - (10:29): or yes you can remove the click and the small image  
vmassol - (10:29): up to you  
vmassol - (10:29): do for the best  
vmassol - (10:29): :)  
vmassol - (10:29): I think clicking and see a large image is nicer for users though  
vmassol - (10:29): but your choice  
sdumitriu - (10:30): The linked image is deprecated  
sburjan - (10:30): yes  
sburjan - (10:30): just updated  
sburjan - (10:30): dunny, they seem pretty same to me .. i mean the diff when clicked and when not  
vmassol - (10:30): and the naming with .png and .PNG is not optimal  
vmassol - (10:31): they're not the same size  
vmassol - (10:31): that's my point  
jvdrean left at 10:31 (Ping timeout: 260 seconds  
vmassol - (10:31): I mean  
vmassol - (10:31): the one you click is \*smaller\*  
vmassol - (10:31): whereas it should be \*larger\* to view more details  
sdumitriu - (10:31): vmassol: Refresh  
sdumitriu - (10:31): They used to be different images, but now should be the same  
vmassol - (10:32): they're now the same  
vmassol - (10:32): right?  
sdumitriu - (10:32): Yes  
sburjan - (10:32): yes  
vmassol - (10:32): ok  
nickless joined #xwiki at 10:32  
sburjan - (10:32): I usually don;t create links from the images  
sburjan - (10:32): but If you insist, I can do that  
vmassol - (10:32): nope I don't  
vmassol - (10:32): but at least remove the old files from teh attachment list  
sburjan - (10:32): but IMO they are big enought, no need for zoom  
sburjan - (10:32): oaky  
sburjan - (10:33): I was keepingthem in case of backward compatib  
vmassol - (10:33): I don't think that's needed but if you want to keep them  
vmassol - (10:33): then please rename them to something meaningful  
sdumitriu - (10:33): No, remove them  
sdumitriu - (10:34): Attachments are kept in the history  
sdumitriu - (10:34): So reverting to an older version of the document will show the old attachments  
mflorea left at 10:34 (Quit: Leaving.  
sburjan - (10:35): okay.. removing  
sburjan - (10:35): done  
sburjan - (10:36): so from now on I should remove deprecated images ?  
vmassol - (10:36): yes  
sburjan - (10:37): stored  
jvelo joined #xwiki at 10:59
